name: Under The Moonlight: Tokyo Revengers Mikey Otome Game
name_original: Under The Moonlight: Tokyo Revengers Mikey Otome Game
description:
Season 2 just aired recently and I remembered that I made an Mikey otome game before so in celebration of season 2 and Valentines day. I ought to release another and longer Mikey otome game. 

For mac users please use chrome to download. If unable to open or download the game. open system preference then open security and privacy then general then open anyway.

For window users. If unable to open or download the game. open Apps and features then installing apps then allow apps from everywhere.

If you would like to support my games please consider tipping on my ko-fi website.

https://ko-fi.com/mhtcos

I also do a commission, If you would like me to build your own otome game.
